alert.note: Alert for Clinch; Echols; Southern Ware (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 05 at 7:00PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of north central Columbia, north central Suwannee, Hamilton, Echols, south central Ware and southeastern Clinch Counties through 730 PM EDT... At 659 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms capable of producing a landspout along a line extending from 8 miles north of Needmore to 11 miles northeast of Jasper to Blue Springs. Movement was east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts and wind gusts of 45 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Jasper, Jennings, Fargo, Suwannee River State Park, Needmore, Belmont, Blue Springs and Crossroads. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for southeastern Georgia.
